  • Constructor Details

    • ClientSettings

      public ClientSettings(String ip, int port, ClientMode mode, NetworkMode network) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates an object with the specified client settings.
      Parameters:
      ip - The ip address of the server to connect with.
      port - The number of port used for the connection.
      mode - The running mode of the client (GUI or TUI).
      network - The network mode (Socket or RMI).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the port number is outside the allowed range.

    • loadJsonFile

      public static ClientSettings loadJsonFile(String fileName) throws IOException
      Load the client setting from a json file. The json text should have the following fields (case-sensitive):
      • "serverId": integer, the maximum number of concurrent games (min=1).
      • "port": integer, the port number bound by the server (min=1024, max=65535).
      • "mode": string, the verbosity level for logging ("verbose", "info", "warning", "error").
      • "network": string, the network connection ("socket", or "rmi")
      If a field is missing, or it has an invalid value, the default value of that setting is used.

      The json text can have duplicate fields and in that case the value assigned for the duplicated setting is one of the specified values. If the json text has extra fields, they are ignored.

      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to load.
      Returns:
      The object containing the server settings specified n the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file does not exist.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If the text is not a valid json-formatted text.

    • loadJsonFile

      public static ClientSettings loadJsonFile(Path filePath) throws IOException
      Load the server setting from a json file. The json text should have the following fields (case-sensitive):
      • "maxLobbies": integer, the maximum number of concurrent games (min=1).
      • "port": integer, the port number bound by the server (min=1024, max=65535).
      • "verbosity": string, the verbosity level for logging ("verbose", "info", "warning", "error").
      If a field is missing, or it has an invalid value, the default value of that setting is used.

      The json text can have duplicate fields and in that case the value assigned for the duplicated setting is one of the specified values. If the json text has extra fields, they are ignored.

      Parameters:
      filePath - The path of the file to load.
      Returns:
      The object containing the server settings specified n the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file does not exist.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If the text is not a valid json-formatted text.

    • parseFromJson

      public static ClientSettings parseFromJson(String json) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException, IllegalArgumentException
      Parse a json text and return the ClientSettings object. The json text should have the following fields (case-sensitive):
      • "serverIp": string, the ip address of the server (or "localhost").
      • "port": integer, the port number where the server is listening for connection (min=1024, max=65535).
      • "mode": string, the graphical mode ("gui", "tui").
      • "network": string, the network connection to use ("socket", "rmi")
      The fields "serverIp" and "port" are mandatory, "mode" and "network" are optional. If an optional field is missing, or it has an invalid value, the default value of that setting is used. The json text can have duplicate fields and in that case the value assigned for the duplicated setting is one of the specified values. If the json text has extra fields, they are ignored.
      Parameters:
      json - The json text with the client settings.
      Returns:
      The object containing the specified client settings.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If "port" or "serverIp" fields are missing or invalid.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If the text is not a valid json-formatted text.

    • getSereverIpValueFromJsonNode

      private static String getSereverIpValueFromJsonNode(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)
      Get the server ip (String) from a json node object, representing the client settings.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The integer representing the port number.

    • parseMode

      private static ClientMode parseMode(String value)
      Convert a string into a ClientMode enum value. If the string cannot be converted, the DEF_CLIENT_MODE is returned. The valid string values are (case-sensitive):
      • "gui"
      • "tui"
      Parameters:
      value - The text to parse.
      Returns:
      The ClientMode value.

    • parseNetwork

      private static NetworkMode parseNetwork(String value)
      Convert a string into a NetworkMode enum value. If the string cannot be converted, the DEF_NETWORK_MODE is returned. The valid string values are (case-sensitive):
      • "socket"
      • "rmi"
      Parameters:
      value - The text to parse.
      Returns:
      The NetworkMode value.
